greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of ludic numbers (A003309).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: ch (i:is) ls'@(l:ls) = if i == l then 1 : ch is ls else 0 : ch is ls'
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 05 2011
